leftSection_5.title: The UAE Residence Visas- Step-by-Step Guide

items.title: Book a Strategic Consultation
items.description: In the first step, we take the time to assess your business structure, visa goals, and desired timeline, and suggest a custom route forward.

items.title: Collect All Relevant Documents
items.description: We then help compile your required documents and paperwork, from Emirates ID to health insurance registration.

items.title: Submit the Application
items.description: Next, our expert consultants submit your visa application to the relevant UAE authority and expedite the approval process.

items.title: Get Your Residence Visa
items.description: Once approved, you’ll receive your residence visa stamp and Emirates ID, empowering you to kickstart your journey in the UAE.

items.title: Enjoy 24/7 Support
items.description: Lastly, we handle renewals, family sponsorships, and additional services like PRO support, compliance, and bank account setup post-issuance.

items.title: How to Cancel a UAE Residence Visa
items.description: If you plan to leave the UAE or change your sponsor, our experts will help you compile, prepare, and submit the necessary paperwork, cancel your passport, and secure cancellations within days.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How can I get a UAE residence visa as a business owner or entrepreneur?
items.answer: You can secure your UAE residence visa by setting up your company, whether in the mainland or a free zone, and follow up by applying for an investor or partner visa linked to your business license.

items.question: How long does the UAE residence visa stay valid?
items.answer: The UAE residence visa can stay valid for 2 to 10 years, depending on the selected location, investment, and business activity.

items.question: What documents do I need to apply for a residence visa?
items.answer: You’ll need a valid trade license, passport copy, visa application form, medical fitness report, Emirates ID application, and tenancy contract. Our team ensures all paperwork is pre-checked and submission-ready.

items.question: What is the processing time for a UAE residence visa?
items.answer: The full process for securing a UAE residence visa can take 7-10 working days, so long as no delays occur and all documents are in order.
